name: VillageEDOCS
overview: VillageEDOCS, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, provides outsourced business process solutions that simplify, facilitate, and enhance critical business processes. Its product line includes Document Management And Content Management to scan paper documents and import electronic files, and emails to perform OCR, edit, and store information in electronic format for secure storage and retrieval; Workflow to simplify the process of bringing tasks, employees, and records together; Document Capture to recognize patterns of text in documents that eliminate the errors, time, and cost that come with manual data entry and filing; and Legislative Agenda Management to automate the municipal government agenda process by creating staff reports, agendas, and packets, as well as facilitating real-time roll-call, vote tabulation, and meeting minutes. In addition, it offers telco-grade calling services, including voicemail; enhanced voicemail, which includes speech navigation and Web/phone message access; and unified communications, audio, and Web conferencing solutions, as well as Internet-based electronic document delivery services. Further, the company engages in creating, maintaining, training, customizing, and supporting computer application programs primarily for the use of city and county governments; selling online payment solutions; selling and installing computer equipment and supplies; printing and ordering forms; providing consulting services; and implementing internal computer networks in communication with IBM iSeries servers. It serves financial services, healthcare, manufacturing, and local government industries through its telesales, field sales, and tele-marketing professionals, as well as through strategic partners.

milestones.description: Barron Partners Divests in VillageEDOCS, Initial Investor Acquires
